SEARCH
Module com.oniverse.maze_runner
Package com.oniverse.neon_dystopia.model.levels

Class Level

java.lang.Object
com.oniverse.neon_dystopia.model.levels.Level
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeListener, EventListener
public class Level extends Object implements PropertyChangeListener
Level : Class that represents a level. It's the master of the game. It contains some mazes, the maze feed and the player. It also implements the PropertyChangeListener interface to listen to the player and the blocks.
See Also:
  • PropertyChangeListener
  • Player
  • Block
  • MazesFeed
  • Maze

  • Constructor Details

    • Level

      public Level(ArrayList<Maze> mazes, LevelProperties properties, int windowSize) throws Exception
      Constructor, it takes a mazes. It also sets the player and the block listeners.
      Parameters:
      mazes - The mazes of the level.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the mazes are null.
      Exception

  • Method Details

    • setLinks

      public void setLinks(ArrayList<Link> links)
      Set link between blocks. If the block is a transporter, it will set the teleportation target.
      Parameters:
      links - The links to set.

    • nextLevel

      public void nextLevel() throws Exception
      Method used to go to the next level. It fire a property change for the level id and the maze to update the view.
      Throws:
      Exception - If there is no more levels.

    • playerMoved

      public void playerMoved(Coordinate lastCoordinate, Coordinate newCoordinate)
      Method used to enter and exit blocks when the player moves.
      Parameters:
      lastCoordinate - The last coordinate of the player.
      newCoordinate - The new coordinate of the player.

    • propertyChange

      public void propertyChange(PropertyChangeEvent evt)
      The property change method of the level.

      It is used to listen to the player and the blocks. It is used to listen to the player health, the block activation and the block textures.

      Specified by:
      propertyChange in interface PropertyChangeListener
      Parameters:
      evt - A PropertyChangeEvent object describing the event source and the property that has changed.
